title: Raspberry Pi 5 16GB Launched
description: The Raspberry Pi 5 now offers a 16GB RAM variant at $120, though for most users the 4GB model remains the best value proposition given competing alternatives like Intel N100 mini PCs.

title: ByteDance Released AI Code Editor
description: ByteDance recently launched Trae, a new AI-powered IDE that's generating buzz in the developer community.

title: TikTok is now banned in US
description: TikTok, the popular social media platform, faces a complete ban in the United States following new federal legislation.
